thread.section_title: Paradise First Aid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paradise First Aid | paradisefirstaid.com.au
thread.title: Rosealie Rossiter
thread.title_full: Paradise First Aid reviewed by Rosealie Rossiter

author: Rosealie Rossiter
title: Rosealie Rossiter
text: Paradise First Aid is truly the best place I've ever been for first aid training! I really wasn't looking forward to losing a day from my weekend but I found it to be enjoyable from start to finish in a comfortable, supportive and easy-to-learn environment. Best of all, at the end of training, I left feeling very confident that I could administer first aid if ever someone needed assistance and I sure didn't feel like that at the beginning of the day. Great training and content Paradise First Aid. Thankyou!
